author: Ed Baines
method: Place all the ingredients, except the bacon, in a pan and cook over a low heat for 8-10 minutes, until thickened to a syrup. Place the chutney into a small bowl.  Cut up the bacon into small pieces and stir into the chutney just before serving.
ingredients: ½ apple, cut into cubes ,  1 plum, stone removed and chopped,  2 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  3 tbsp white wine vinegar,  ½ tsp mixed spice,  1 bay leaf,  2 bacon rashers, fried until crisp and golden
